product_name: K2 Lockjaw Carbon-Carbon Probe Ski Poles
long_description: More than just a super lightweight, adjustable ski pole, the all-carbon Probe shaft features depth notches and an inclinometer for better analyzing snowpack and slide danger in the backcountry.
short_description: More than just a super lightweight, adjustable ski pole, the all-carbon Probe shaft features depth notches and an inclinometer for better analyzing snowpack and slide danger in the backcountry.
